ygData.subject: Re: <-------idiot
ygData.msgSnippet: this happened to a bard friend this weekend , he is a lvl 37 bard , a high 40 s warrior friend , that he had known since very early levels , did this to him ,
ygData.messageBody:
this happened to a bard friend this weekend , he is a lvl 37 bard , a high
40's warrior friend , that he had known since very early levels , did this
to him ,

the guy thinks he did it because the warrior is going to sell his account ,
and the bard'ss equipment thrown in might jack up the price ,

My bud is a lvl 37 or 38 bard , all he was left with was a few items in the
bank for sale/trade , some lambent quest components , and a gnoll hide
lariat , He decided rather than start over collecting items to rebuild his
inventory , he gave his account to his best friend ,

it seems as if you can't even trust your best friends nowadays , greed over
items , and the e-bay crap are ruining some ppl's gaming experience ,

right now on Rallos , ppl make real world profit from their looted items
when pk'ing ,

Nokker StormSurge
Rallos Zek


----- Original Message -----
From: <John_Senior@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 10:46 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] <-------idiot


> From: John_Senior@...
>
> Ack, I am very sorry to hear your misfortune.
> Now, this is the type of person I am but I would be really pissed right
> now, you should report this person to a GM, I am sure something can be
done
> because I remember reading a post on www.everquest.com about a guy who was
> given consent, looted the corpse and then logged, he posted saying that
his
> brother wanted to play, well anyway, the gm's banned his account, he then
> logged onto his brother account and got that one banned, he then continued
> to get another brothers account banned. The GM's also got the equipment
> back for this unfortunate person who had it stolen from him.
>
> Go report this person NOW. He deserves all he gets for being such an ass
> hole.
>
> Ok, rant over. Goodluck, I hope you get your stuff back.
>
> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 40 Songs <Guardians of Light>
> Veeshan Server
>
>
>
>
> "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...> on 02/03/2000 15:19:41
>
> Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
> To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
> cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] <-------idiot
>
>
>
>
> From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
>
> Hello everyone :)
>
> Well I just wanted to tell you a little tale so that you can all remember
> not to make my mistakes. Last night, I made the mistake of consenting
> someone to drag Tani's corpse out of the Scryer room in Guk. Well, long
> story short, all my armor and weapons were stolen (punishment for
twinking,
> heh) by this guy.
>
> There are all sorts of complicating sidelines to this story which I'll
> spare
> you. Although I know it was always a risk, I just never thought someone
> would be so mean and viscious. The items are just items, but people that
> do
> that stuff just plain suck!
>
> Guess I'll have to make a contest to see how much of my quest stuff I can
> get back in one week.
>
> Hope you're all having a great day... and DON'T CONSENT SOMEONE YOU DON'T
> KNOW!!!
> (most of you have probably figured that out - guess I get to wear the
naive
> banner for the week)
>
> Tani 20th nekkid Bard
> Halana 50th Shamana
> Solusek Ro
>
>
